actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to establish a commission to study the adequacy of the annual Federal payments to the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Establishes the Commission on the Adequacy of the Annual Federal Payment to the District of Columbia to conduct a one year study of the adequacy of the annual Federal payment to the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to establish a commission to study the adequacy of the annual Federal payments to the District of Columbia.
